{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=N3 |revision= |upc=843456180083 |ean= |asin=B00C20EFYS |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/03/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=V7TN3 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5356C0 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L8006 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5356C0 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=schematics, block diagram |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|150M Wireless Router}}
[http://www.tenda.cn/tendacn/product/show.aspx?productid=395 Product page]
===FCC=== "N3" and "V1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The schematics identify the SoC used as a BCM5357C0.. :but this is a dual-stream chip. It appears to instead use BCM5356B0.
====Block diagram==== :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM5356C0 @300MHz 2.4GHz 1T1R WiSoC :Flash: Macronix MX25L8006 1MB SPI SOP8 :RAM: EtronTech EM638165TS 8MB SDRAM TSOP54 :Skyworks AS179 SPDT Switch :Ryanair FR9882 DC/DC Converter :GTM GTT3585 Power MOSFET TSSOP-6
